url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT readiness_score AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE readiness_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT sleep_score AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT activity_score AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT (deep_duration + rem_duration + light_duration) / 3600.0 AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT heart_rate_lowest AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE heart_rate_lowest IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT hrv_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE hrv_avg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, readiness_score AS readiness, sleep_score AS sleep, activity_score AS activity FROM daily_summaries WHERE day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"WITH d AS (SELECT day, readiness_score AS score FROM daily_summaries WHERE readiness_score IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years')) SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, score, AVG(score) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS score_7d FROM d ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"WITH d AS (SELECT day, sleep_score AS score FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_score IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years')) SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, score, AVG(score) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS score_7d FROM d ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, (deep_duration + rem_duration + light_duration) / 3600.0 AS hours FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, deep_duration/3600.0 AS deep, rem_duration/3600.0 AS rem, light_duration/3600.0 AS light FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, sleep_efficiency AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_efficiency IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, sleep_latency AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_latency IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, heart_rate_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND heart_rate_avg IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, hrv_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND hrv_avg IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, breath_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND breath_avg IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, sleep_restfulness AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_restfulness IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, temperature_deviation AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND temperature_deviation IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, activity_steps AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_steps IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, activity_total_calories AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_total_calories IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, activity_active_calories AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_active_calories IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, NULL AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, NULL AS high, NULL AS medium, NULL AS low FROM daily_summaries WHERE day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', substr(start_datetime,1,10)) AS week, COUNT(*) AS workouts FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years') GROUP BY week ORDER BY week","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', substr(start_datetime,1,10)) AS week, SUM((julianday(end_datetime)-julianday(start_datetime))*24) AS hours FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years') GROUP BY week ORDER BY week","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT COALESCE(activity_label,'unknown') AS activity, COUNT(*) AS count FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years') GROUP BY activity ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 12","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS value FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years')","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT SUM((julianday(end_datetime)-julianday(start_datetime))*24) AS value FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years')","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, stress_index AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE stress_index IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, resilience_contributors_stress AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE resilience_contributors_stress IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}
{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, stress_index AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE stress_index IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, resilience_contributors_sleep AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE resilience_contributors_sleep IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

{"sql":"WITH joined AS (SELECT ds.day, ds.readiness_score AS readiness, (se.deep_duration + se.rem_duration + se.light_duration)/3600.0 AS sleep_h FROM daily_summaries ds JOIN sleep_episodes se ON ds.day=se.day AND se.type='long_sleep' WHERE ds.day>=date('now','-1 year') AND ds.readiness_score IS NOT NULL) SELECT CASE WHEN sleep_h<6 THEN '<6h' WHEN sleep_h<7 THEN '6-7h' WHEN sleep_h<8 THEN '7-8h' ELSE '8h+' END AS bucket, ROUND(AVG(readiness),1) AS avg_readiness FROM joined GROUP BY bucket ORDER BY bucket","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', day) AS week, ROUND(AVG(readiness_score),1) AS readiness, ROUND(AVG(sleep_score),1) AS sleep, ROUND(AVG(activity_score),1) AS activity FROM daily_summaries WHERE day>=date('now','-1 year') GROUP BY week ORDER BY week","params":[]}

{"sql":"SELECT 'daily_summaries' AS resource, MIN(day) AS min_day, MAX(day) AS max_day, COUNT(*) AS records FROM daily_summaries UNION ALL SELECT 'sleep_episodes', MIN(day), MAX(day), COUNT(*) FROM sleep_episodes UNION ALL SELECT 'heart_rate_samples', MIN(substr(timestamp,1,10)), MAX(substr(timestamp,1,10)), COUNT(*) FROM heart_rate_samples UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_logs', MIN(substr(start_datetime,1,10)), MAX(substr(start_datetime,1,10)), COUNT(*) FROM activity_logs","params":[]}
